text: Soni pamasile patupeleche ku wandu mu aji Qur’an ntundu uliose wachilandanyo. Nambo naga n’di ntite mwaichilile nacho (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) chisimosimo chilichose (chakulosya ukuona wa utume wenu), awala waakufuulu chisimu chene mpaka ajile (pakwasalila wakulupilila): “Nganim’ba jenumanja ikaweje wakuya yaunami.”
